item.title: wireshark
item.description: Wireshark Windows 配置 SSL Version 3.0.3 配置 SSLKEYLOGFILE 系统变量 配置 Wireshark 编辑 -> 首选项 -> Protocols -> TLS 重启 Wireshark 过滤器查看 视图 -> 内部 -> 支持的协议

item.title: master-ip
item.description: Motivation The Internet Protocol is designed for use in interconnected systems of packet-switched computer communication networks. Such a system has been called a “catenet”. The internet protocol provides for transmitting blocks of data called datagrams from sources to destinations, where sources and destinations are hosts identified by fixed length addresses. The internet protocol also provides for fragmentation and reassembly of long datagrams, if necessary, for transmission through “small packet” networks.
